thread.title: Susie Hodel
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Susie Hodel

author: Susie Hodel
title: Susie Hodel
text: I ordered some prisms for my five year old granddaughter, with her hanging over my shoulder telling me which ones she liked best. She loves rainbows and wanted to make some on the walls like Pollyanna did. We googled them, found your site, ordered them quickly and easily, and had them in a couple days. She was in heaven!
